entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
